data.title: SLA Industries 2nd Edition is at the printers
data.meta_description: All four cover designs have been proofed, the inks reduced to 330% and the proofs approved. It’s happening. This means that we will be getting them back over the next four to six weeks, all going well, and then we will be shipping them out to you or your local games shop. Along with the […]
data.text:
All four cover designs have been proofed, the inks reduced to 330% and the proofs approved. It’s happening.

This means that we will be getting them back over the next four to six weeks, all going well, and then we will be shipping them out to you or your local games shop. Along with the books, the screens and Quickstart are being mashed into submission by our pals in Lithuania.
